product.title: TrimTide 3 In 1 Hot Air Styler And Rotating Hair Dryer Multifunction Electric Hair Styler Comb
product.description:
3 in 1 hot air styler and rotating hair dryer

Features:

1.Versatile 3-in-1 Styling Tool: Our hair straightener brush combines the functionality of a straightening brush, curling iron, and hairdryer. With two interchangeable brushes, it offers endless styling options. The larger barrel adds volume and smoothness to thick hair, while the smaller barrel creates effortless natural looks and soft waves.
2.Freedom to Style with 360° Flexibility: Featuring a 360-degree rotating brush head and adjustable power cord, you can design your hair from any angle for safe and convenient styling. Enjoy worry-free home styling that rivals professional salons. Whether you desire voluminous curls, sleek straight locks, or extra bounce and shine, this rotatable hair curler brush is your secret to effortlessly elevate your styling game.
3.Customizable Heat Control: Our rotating hair dryer brush offers three temperature settings - hot, warm, and cool, catering to various hair types and styles. Its bi-directional rotation mechanism effortlessly creates natural-looking curls, providing you with the salon-worthy appearance you desire.
4.Nourishing and Damage-Reducing: Crafted with eco-friendly alloy as a heat conductor, our hot air comb releases negative ions to moisturize and nourish your hair. Experience locks that are softer, smoother, and more radiant, while benefiting from even heat distribution that minimizes damage caused by overheating.
5.Salon-Quality Results at Home: Say goodbye to expensive salon visits and welcome gorgeous hair in the comfort of your own home. Our negative ion hair styler comb offers professional-grade performance combined with user-friendly features, giving you the power to create stunning hairstyles with ease.


Specification:
Number of nozzles: 2

Size: 370.00x140.00x140.00mm/14.57x5.51x5.51inch

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
